all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Verily I say unto you all: Arise and shine forth, that thy light may be a standard for the nations;
Doctrine and Covenants 115:5
Quote of the Day
"Showing reverence for sacred things gives meaning to much of what we do every day and strengthens our feeling of gratitude."
Elder Ulisses Soares | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
